mruby-dir
=========

Dir class for mruby.  Supported methods are:

`.chdir`
`.delete`
`.entries`
`.exist?`
`.foreach`
`.getwd`
`.mkdir`
`.open`
`#close`
`#each`
`#read`
`#rewind`
`#seek`
`#tell`
